body_html:
I think that the guarding is also important, i.e. the code should be like this:

if __name__ == "__main__":
  with tf.Session() as sess:
    # do sth with sess
  # now sess will be cleaned up, even if there was an exception
body_text:
I think that the guarding is also important, i.e. the code should be like this:
if __name__ == "__main__":
  with tf.Session() as sess:
    # do sth with sess
  # now sess will be cleaned up, even if there was an exception
body:
I think that the guarding is also important, i.e. the code should be like this:

```
if __name__ == "__main__":
  with tf.Session() as sess:
    # do sth with sess
  # now sess will be cleaned up, even if there was an exception
```
